description:
The Flame Haze army retreats to the Palace of Light with the help of one of the 4 Gods of Earth, and Margery Daw. Samuel Demantius sets up a decoy stalling the Denizens` advance and discovery of the Palace of Light. Flame Hazes: Chiara Toscana and Sale Habichtsburg, carries Shana and the gang as they fly away.
Source: Wiki
